name: Repo Runner
description:
You owe a debt to the Company, settle it by repossessing cars from the company's debtees. Drive around and tow the target vehicle as quickly as you can before the owner catches you!

Coded, illustrated, and composed in Pico-8.

Devlog: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=31322

My second game, for the Gooseberry Jam May 2017: You are the villain. Inspired by this article about modern repomen: https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/economy/the-surprising-return-of-the-rep...
